title: LIVE Niche Research For Amazon KDP

tactics.name: Amazon Bestseller Scanning
tactics.description: Scan Amazon's bestseller list to identify trending niches and filter by sales rank and review counts.
steps: Set location to the US and use incognito mode to avoid search history interference
Scroll through Amazon bestsellers to spot trending topics
Filter results by sales rank (targeting <50,000) and review counts (<200)
caveats: May miss niche opportunities in non-English markets
source_quotes: I always set my dress to somewhere in the US... go to incognito mode

tactics.name: bsr_review_filter
tactics.description: Filter keywords by Best Seller Rank (BSR) and review counts to identify low-competition niches
steps: Use KD Spy to narrow search results by removing high-BSR books
Focus on keywords with BSR under 50,000 and review counts under 200
Analyze author catalogs for related successful titles
caveats: May miss niche opportunities with higher competition
source_quotes: we want to get down to around about 3,200 or even lower maybe

tactics.name: analyze_book_internals
tactics.description: Study book contents, covers, and keywords for inspiration
caveats: e-books may lack physical interaction signals
source_quotes: look inside the book find out what the cover is what the color they're using

tactics.name: create_variations
tactics.description: Develop multiple titles with different target personas
source_quotes: you can change the internals different pictures and you could s it to Mom to Dad

tactics.name: Niche Research Tracker
tactics.description: Use the niche research tracker tool to identify untapped opportunities alongside existing strategies
caveats: When BSR thresholds are not met
source_quotes: make sure you also download the niche research tracker

heuristics.name: Low-Review Niche Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niches with high sales rank potential
source_quotes: we take away 3 to four [results]... 250,000 average sales rank

heuristics.name: low_review_boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200, prioritize this niche
source_quotes: look for books with lower review counts

heuristics.name: review_density_check
heuristics.condition: If a book has fewer than 200 reviews, it may indicate untapped potential
source_quotes: check out the three star reviews because that will give you some feedback

heuristics.name: Review Count Boost
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews is less than 200 then boost
source_quotes: check out the links below particularly probably the publishing accelerator course

claims.statement: Amazon's search results can be influenced by previous search history, necessitating incognito mode for unbiased data.
source_quotes: if I search just under a normal tab... what I really want to find

claims.statement: KDP niches with low review counts and high BSR potential can yield profitable opportunities
source_quotes: there's definitely definitely a way that you could create these

claims.statement: Hardcover books may perform better than e-books for physical interaction
source_quotes: I'd prefer to have a printing book that I could actually write in

claims.statement: The niche research tracker is available for free
source_quotes: niche research tracker and that's available uh for you to download for free

niche_patterns.description: Target specific demographics with unmet needs in niche formats
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines relatable identity with problem-solving potential and format constraints
source_quotes: looking for low content books... Nana tell me a story
